member.name: P:DotNetCore.CAP.MongoDB.MongoDBOptions.DatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the database name to use when creating database objects. Default value: "cap"

member.name: P:DotNetCore.CAP.MongoDB.MongoDBOptions.DatabaseConnection
member.summary: MongoDB database connection string. Default value: "mongodb://localhost:27017"

member.name: P:DotNetCore.CAP.MongoDB.MongoDBOptions.ReceivedCollection
member.summary: MongoDB received message collection name. Default value: "received"

member.name: P:DotNetCore.CAP.MongoDB.MongoDBOptions.PublishedCollection
member.summary: MongoDB published message collection name. Default value: "published"

member.name: M:DotNetCore.CAP.CapTransactionExtensions.StartTransaction(MongoDB.Driver.IMongoClient,DotNetCore.CAP.ICapPublisher,System.Boolean)
member.param: Whether the transaction is automatically committed when the message is published
member.returns: The of MongoDB transaction session object.
